titleStmt.title: John G. Foster, Special Orders, No. 469
CWG11581

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p:
Headquarters Department of the Ohio,
Cincinnati, Ohio, December 22nd, 1863,
SPECIAL ORDERS,
No. 469,

2,, ,, ,, 1st Sergt James R Howard. Co "C" 1st Cavalry Kentucky Volunteers, is hereby discharged the service, to date from the 28th day of October 1863, to enable him to accept a Commission then tendered him by the Governor of Kentucky, and since when he has been acting in the capacity of a Commissioned Officer.

BY COMMAND OF MAJOR GENERAL FOSTER.
R. Morrow
Assistant Adjutant General.

1s Cavy
Sergt Howard
Discharged
Filed Decr 26. 1863
